segments.text: Excuse me , ma'am . Can you tell me where the nearest postoffice is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . Go straight ahead . Turn right at the next street . You'll see a tall , yellow building.The post office is on the first floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mean that I go that way for one block , then turn right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , It's only about five minutes ' walk .
segments.speaker: S2
